categoriesExplanation: The video is classified primarily under 'Body weight' with high confidence (score 0.9) due to the explicit focus on performing 100 squats, as detailed in the title 'Guided 100 Squat Workout!' and the description, which emphasizes lower body fitness primarily through body weight squats.
